name: Coinzettle
slogan: Next generation payment processor for digital currencies

jobs.title: Lead Engineer (PHP)
jobs.description:
Coinzettle is looking for an experienced senior engineer to come on board and take the lead in the development of our next generation digital currencies payment processor. Our technologies allow merchants to accept digital currency payments quickly, seamlessly and without risk.

• The product has been built to a launch standard, and we have a number of high profile merchants onboard for launch. 
• We have an experienced team of entrepreneurs and fintech veterans already within the business, and are actively recruiting across core areas of the business. 
• We are well backed by some of the leading names in the e-commerce and fintech world, giving us a great opportunity for rapid scale.

Responsibilities
• Develop all technical aspects of the company’s strategy to ensure alignment with our business goals
• Building a world class engineering team 
• Take technical ownership of existing and future products
• Discover and implement innovative and upcoming technologies that yield competitive advantage
• Communicate technology strategy to the wider team, partners and investors
• Work with the rest of the business to help scope, design and support solutions
• Collaborating with local and remote team members


Requirements 
The ideal candidate will have fintech experience and have a strong understanding and passion for digital currencies. Even better if you have direct payment processing experience. You’ll have a proven track record leading technology teams in complex engineering environments. Ideally you’ll have had delivery responsibility across multiple teams. Most of all you’ll be passionate about making Coinzettle a success.

You must be experienced and fully competent in the following:

• Working in linux environment 
• General programming languages: PHP, JavaScript
• Database: MySQL, NoSQL
• Frameworks: Laravel
• Package management: Composer, NPM.
• Automation: Gulp and Google Closure Compiler

What We Offer
• This is an integral role within our growing business, and for the right person we will offer a competitive salary and an attractive equity package
• Hard working and easy-going colleagues in a great working environment
• A fantastic opportunity for career growth within the business
• A strong focus on personal development 
• Flexible working and always a healthy work/life balance


Please don’t just send us your CV, we would like a brief cover note explaining why your personality and previous experience make you the best person for this role.


You must be happy to work in Central London
